original: Bendix, Karl Natanael, kontorschef, Varberg, f. 21/8/94 i Varberg av Anders B. o. Amanda Steinorth. G. 30 m. Gertrud Hedin. Barn: Gunnar f. 32, Åke 36, Gösta 39. — Realex. i Varberg 11, avg:ex. fr. Filip Holmquists hand:inst. i Gbg 12. Res. t. Tyskl., Engl., Danm., Norge, FinL, Belg. o. Frankr. Anst. v. Blidberg, Metcalfe & Co. i Gbg 12-13, kont:chef v. Var-bergs Trävaruexp. A-B sed. 13. Lär. v. Varbergs stads yrkessk. sed. 18. Led. av styr. f. Varbergs Trävaruexp. A-B sed. 34, led. av stadsfullm. i Varberg sed. 27, av |landstinget sed. 47, av nykterh :nd, sekr. där sed. 26, led. av styr. f. Haill. nykterh :ndrs länsförb. •sed. 36, v. ordf. där ised. 45, iled. av istyr. f. Varbergs föreläsn :fören. ised. 21, ordf. i Varbergs fodkparti sed. 40, ordf. i Hall. valkretsförb. av foilkp. &ed. 40, led. av folkp. förtroenderåd sed. 42, rev. v. Apelvikens kustsanat. sed. 26, tryckfrihetsomb. ised. 36. Medl. av Odd Fellow.
translated: Bendix, Karl Natanael, office manager, Varberg, b. 21/8/94 in Varberg to Anders B. and Amanda Steinorth. Married in 19xx to Gertrud Hedin. Children: Gunnar b. 32, Åke b. 36, Gösta b. 39. Completed secondary education in Varberg in 1911 and graduated from Filip Holmquist's trade school in Gothenburg in 1912. Traveled to Germany, England, Denmark, Norway, Finland, Belgium, and France. Employed by Blidberg, Metcalfe & Co. in Gothenburg from 1912-1913, and office manager for Varbergs Trävaruexp. A-B since 1913. Teacher at Varberg's vocational school since 1918. Board member of Varbergs Trävaruexp. A-B since 1934, member of Varberg's city council since 1927, member of the county council since 1947, secretary of the temperance association since 1926, member of the board of directors of the Halland temperance association since 1936, vice chairman since 1945, member of the board of Varberg's lecture association since 1921, chairman of Varberg's socialist party since 1940, chairman of the Halland constituency association of the socialist party since 1940, member of the socialist party's trust council since 1942, auditor of Apelvikens kustsanat. since 1926, press freedom ombudsman since 1936. Member of Odd Fellow.
